com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.controller

Class SCUIControllerRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.controller.SCUIControllerRegistry

  • public class SCUIControllerRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the caching mechanism for the controller metadata.
    Note: Initial idea behind controller groups was to have different set of controllers for different apps. At the moment there is only controller group being used , 'default'. There is another level of hierarchy being added for CUF,to support org based path for extensions.So a different set of controller definitions will be loaded for each org. Eg, a user from org A logs on, then default controllers from /controllers/default path will be read and then extension controllers from /extn/A/controllers/default will be read. Also since CUF extensions are created and read from runtime instead of war when -DuiExtensibilityMode is set to true, so check has been added to read the extensions from runtime using absolute path of install dir. psheoran
